participant_1.background:

i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
i hate paying my bills.

pop is my favorite music.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing alright. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a comic artist, I'm trying to get my work published!
That's so cool! What kind of comics do you draw?
I mainly draw superhero comics, but I'm also working on a horror comic.
Horror comics are the best! I love being scared.
I'm glad to hear that! I love the feeling of being scared too.
I'm not sure I have a favorite, but I really like The Conjuring.
That's a good one! I also like The Conjuring 2.
Me too! I'm excited for The Conjuring 3 to come out.
Me too! I'm sure it will be great.
